comments:
To reproduce:
Put some test in the copy buffer
Clear the console
type: asdf
hit return
Ctrl-A
Ctrl-V

Fixed. The document worked by combining alike paritions (input partitions in 
this case). However, once a partition has been written to the proxy (when ENTER 
is pressed), the parition should no longer be able to combined with following 
(same type) partitions. As well, an empty input partition cannot be removed 
from the document, as it maintains the boundary between read-only and read-
write input partitions (for the key event handler in the console view).

Changes in ConsoleDocumentPartitioner and InputPartition.
Verified (with some very minor changes to the code).
